Author: gravitywolf
Content:
```bash
if [ $# -eq 0 ]
then
    rm -v *.class
    javac -verbose *.java 2> debug.txt
    echo '[Launching Application]'
    java Main
elif [ $1 = "-h" ]
then
    echo '----------------------------------------------------'
    echo '- Removes old .class files, and recompiles project -'
    echo '----------------------------------------------------'
elif [ $1 = "-f" ]
then
    rm -v $2.class
    javac -verbose $2.java 2> debug.txt
    echo '[Launching Application]'
    java Main
fi
```

Author: .thurston
Content: @Robbhimself yeah, basically. You will need a config.cpp which includes the cfgMods (information here - https://thurston.pw/Mod.cpp_Removal ), and that's basically it!

Content: so if i had it structured like "@mymod/Addons/Scripts(.pbo)/" id put my config.cpp in the root the scripts folder yeah?

Author: jacob_mango
Content: I just use the root prefix name

Author: realrobbhimself
Content: i have scripts.pbo and a few others in my addons

Author: jacob_mango
Content: Each PBO has an internal directory structure. The prefix is how the structure starts

Author: .thurston
Content: I just use dir= as my PBO name

Author: realrobbhimself
.thurston
Content: You can remove the "World" dependency, but looks fine to me

Author: jacob_mango
Content: Nope. You can't use the same prefix as another mod

Content: it doesn't have to be called scripts.pbo btw

Author: sentepu
Content:
```bach
@echo off
set PBOManager="C:\Program Files\PBO Manager v.1.4 beta\PBOConsole.exe"
title DayZ Server Launcher
cls

pause

:reboot

echo Killing DayZServer_x64.exe
taskkill /F /IM DayZServer_x64.exe /T

REM is for commenting thats fucking weird

echo Killing DayZ_x64.exe
taskkill /F /IM DayZ_x64.exe /T

timeout /t 1

D:
CD "D:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\DayZServer"


echo Delete mission database
del /Q /S "D:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\DayZServer\mpmissions\BlackRavenDM.chernarusplus\storage_1"

echo PBO the mod
%PBOManager% -pack "D:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\DayZServer\BlackRavenDM\Addons\BlackRavenDM" "D:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\DayZServer\BlackRavenDM\Addons\BlackRavenDM.pbo"

REM echo mod to client
REM xcopy "D:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\DayZServer\BlackRavenDM\Addons\BlackRavenDM.pbo" "E:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\DayZ\BlackRavenDM\Addons\BlackRavenDM.pbo" /Y

timeout /t 1

echo start server 
start DayZServer_x64.exe -cfg=basic.cfg -scrAllowFileWrite -profiles=D:\DayZServer\profiles -mod=BlackRavenDM -config=serverBlackRaven.cfg -adminlog -dologs -freezecheck -scriptDebug=true -name=zalexkiServer -port=2302 -noPause -noSound
wmic process where name="DayZServer_x64.exe" CALL setpriority "high priority"
timeout /t 30

E:
CD "E:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\DayZ"

echo start gameclient
start DayZ_BE.exe -mod=BlackRavenDM -config=serverDZ.cfg -name=Sen -connect=192.168.1.36:2302 -windowed -noPause

Echo Waiting for server kill

pause

goto reboot```
